meanings.sent1: The ineffectuality of the old vacuum cleaner made cleaning difficult.
meanings.sent2: The ineffectuality of the medicine surprised the patient.
meanings.sent3: The ineffectuality of the broken umbrella in the rain was comical.
meanings.sent4: The ineffectuality of the flashlight in broad daylight was like a candle in the sun.
meanings.sent5: The ineffectuality of the worn-out shoes was evident in every step.

meanings.definition: The state of being ineffective or unable to produce a desired result.
meanings.sent1: She felt frustrated by the ineffectuality of her efforts to fix the leak.
meanings.sent2: The ineffectuality of the plan became apparent during the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The ineffectuality of the broken pencil sharpener was annoying.
meanings.sent4: The ineffectuality of the compass in the maze was like a blindfold.
meanings.sent5: The ineffectuality of the old computer was evident in its slow performance.
